codes.0: Properties WITHOUT windstorm protective device credit OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Properties WITH properly installed and maintained windstorm protective devices (ML-415) and mobile home meets wind load provisions set forth in the ANSI/ASCE 7-88
codes.2: Properties WITH properly installed and maintained windstorm protective devices (ML-415) and mobile home DOES NOT meet wind load provisions set forth in the ANSI/ASCE 7-88

codes.0: Properties WITHOUT windstorm protective device credit OR Does Not Apply
codes.1: Properties WITH windstorm protective device credit for having installed protective devices on all openings: AAIS ML-415 Endorsement or equivalent / ISO HO 04 21 Endorsement or equivalent

codes.0: Policies NOT written on a consent-to-rate basis OR Does Not Apply'
codes.1: Policies written on a consent-to-rate basis
